originalText.text: I booked an appointment with Rachel landman about 3 years ago and the only reason I’m writing this review now is because I haven’t been able to get the courage to book someone again. Upon arrival there was no one at the front desk, no signs or anything but I saw a door where her office is so of course I knocked. No one answered so I sat in the waiting area thinking maybe she’s running late. About 15 minutes later she comes out of that same door with a patient and proceeds to tell me that “it’s rude to knock on the door while I have a patient in here because it interrupts the session.” So of course I cancelled the appointment and left because it takes a lot to finally take the steps to get help and the first interaction I had with her was just nasty. How was I supposed to know her previous session was running over into my time? Her response to me knocking was completely uncalled for. I hope no one else experiences this.

originalText.text: My therapist has taught me a lot about mindufulness. Been super-super helpful. I’m a very hard-working person, I work two jobs. Lots of stress. Lots to worry about. Leaning these tools are a life-saver.

originalText.text: My teenage daughter was struggling with depression. We were trying everything but it wasn’t helping. We finally took her to see a therapist at Humantold who was able to turn her around. Someone who could relate to teengirls. My daughter considers her a best friend now.

text.text: My teenage daughter was struggling with depression. We were trying everything but it wasn’t helping. We finally took her to see a therapist at Humantold who was able to turn her around. Someone who could relate to teengirls. My daughter considers her a best friend now.

originalText.text: I used to hate therapy. All my therapists would just sit there nodding their heads asking “How does that make you feel?” At least here they talk to you normally. Like you’re a real person. Who has real-life problems. It’s been a very different experience. Been pleasantly surprised.

text.text: I used to hate therapy. All my therapists would just sit there nodding their heads asking “How does that make you feel?” At least here they talk to you normally. Like you’re a real person. Who has real-life problems. It’s been a very different experience. Been pleasantly surprised.

originalText.text: Karolina has and is a fantastic therapist. She takes the time to listen and understand. I'm incredibly grateful for the work we have and continue to do.
